app.global.name: SATAEX
app.global.description: SATAEX is one of the fastest growing cryptocurrency exchanges, with more than 2 million registered users. You can buy and sell crypto instantly, or trade popular coins across different contract types as you’d like.
app.home.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Platform
app.auth.invalid-password: Minimum 8 characters, including letters and numbers
app.auth.rewards-widget-description: A $20 bonus in USDT and unlimited number of reward cards await when you refer friends.
app.auth.robust-widget-description: Get real-time market data and competitive market depth and liquidity.
app.auth.security-widget-description: We keep your assets securely stored offline for maximum protection.
app.auth.chat-widget-description: 24/7 multilingual support means you'll always get answers to your questions.
app.login.title: Login
app.login.subheader: Log in now to start trading!
app.sign-up.title: Sign up
app.sign-up.subheader: Setting up an account takes less than 1 minute.
app.sign-up.checkbox-message: I have read and agree to SATAEX's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
app.home.header-description: We've made it easier to buy, sell, trade, and earn with cryptocurrencies.
app.home.trade-reason-title: Here are a few reasons why you should trade with us
app.home.trade-reason-1-content: Get real-time market data and a competitive market liquidity to stay ahead.
app.home.trade-reason-2-label: A crypto platform you can count on
app.home.trade-reason-2-content: Trade worry-free with our 99.9% availability track record even through volatile market periods.
app.home.trade-reason-3-content: 24/7 multilingual support means you’ll get answers every time, all the time.
app.home.trade-banner-description: Take the dependable SATAEX experience with you and trade whenever, wherever.
